entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
